summary.span: 表示数据绑定列表控件中的数据项。

span.span: Represents a data item in a data-bound list control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件表示数据绑定列表控件中的单个数据项，如或控件。A control represents an individual data item within a data-bound list control, such as a or a control. 有几种方法来指定列表控件中的项显示的文本。There are several ways to specify the text displayed for an item in the list control. 最常见方法是将文本放在内部 HTML 内容。The most common method is by placing text in the inner HTML content. 内部的 HTML 内容是开始标记和结束标记之间的文本控件。The inner HTML content is the text between the opening and closing tags of the control. 此外可以使用属性指定的项列表控件中显示的文本。You can also use the property to specify the text displayed in the list control for the item. 属性可用于将值与关联的项在列表控件中，此外到控件中显示的文本。The property allows you to associate a value with the item in the list control, in addition to the text displayed in the control. 例如，您可以显示文本的项在列表控件中，如`"Item 1"`，并使用属性以指定的项的值如`"$1.99"`。For example, you can display text for an item in the list control, such as `"Item 1"`, and use the property to specify a value for that item, such as `"$1.99"`. 您可以拥有内部 HTML 内容的任意组合，或属性集。You can have any combination of the inner HTML content, , or properties set. 生成的 HTML 输出的控件取决于设置这三个属性的组合。The resulting HTML output for the control depends on the combination of these three properties that are set. 例如，如果所有三个属性设置为如下所示：For example, if all three properties are set as follows: ``` Inner 1 ``` 有关使用 HTML 内容的内部呈现的内部 HTML 内容和属性用于`Value`属性。The inner HTML content is used for rendered inner HTML content and the property is used for the `Value` attribute. 生成的 HTML 呈现输出是：The resulting HTML rendering output is: ``` ``` 下表列出了设置的属性和用于呈现的内部 HTML 内容的相应属性的组合和`Value`属性。The following table lists the combination of set properties and the corresponding property used for the rendered inner HTML content and `Value` attribute. 在左侧的三列列出设置的属性的组合。The three columns on the left list the combination of set properties. 在右侧的两个列列表的属性值用于相应的属性。The two columns on the right list which property value is used for the corresponding attribute. |内部 HTML 内容Inner HTML content|Text 属性Text property|Value 属性Value property|呈现的内部 HTML 内容Rendered Inner HTML content|呈现的 Value 属性Rendered Value attribute| |------------------------|-------------------|--------------------|---------------------------------|------------------------------| |SetSet|SetSet|SetSet|内部 HTML 内容Inner HTML content|Value 属性Value property| |SetSet|SetSet|未设置Not set|内部 HTML 内容Inner HTML content|内部 HTML 内容Inner HTML content| |SetSet|未设置Not set|SetSet|内部 HTML 内容Inner HTML content|Value 属性Value property| |SetSet|未设置Not set|未设置Not set|内部 HTML 内容Inner HTML content|内部 HTML 文本Inner HTML text| |未设置Not set|SetSet|SetSet|Text 属性Text property|Value 属性Value property| |未设置Not set|SetSet|未设置Not set|Text 属性Text property|Text 属性Text property| |未设置Not set|未设置Not set|SetSet|Value 属性Value property|Value 属性Value property| |未设置Not set|未设置Not set|未设置Not set|未设置Not set|未设置Not set| > [!NOTE] > 因为和属性都具有默认值为空字符串，可以将列表控件中具有空列表项。Because the and properties each have a default value of an empty string, it is possible to have empty list items in the list control. 当显示一个列表控件时，任何与控制其属性设置为`true`将会突出显示控件中。When a list control is displayed, any control with its property set to `true` appears highlighted in the control. 控件提供了属性，以允许您指定是否控制是启用还是禁用状态。The control provides the property to allow you to specify whether a control is enabled or disabled. 一个已禁用的控件将呈灰色，以指示不能选择它。A control that is disabled is dimmed to indicate that it cannot be selected. 使用此属性来禁用控件中任意一种控制或控件。Use this property to disable a control in either a control or a control. > [!NOTE] > 不能使用此属性来禁用控制控制或控件。You cannot use this property to disable a control in a control or control. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件的控件。The following example illustrates the use of controls within a control. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 使用指定的文本、值和启用的数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified text, value, and enabled data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`Text`|`text` 参数的值。The value of the `text` parameter.| |`Value`|`value` 参数的值。The value of the `value` parameter.| |`Enabled`|`enabled` 参数的值。The value of the `enabled` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示商品添加和删除项从控件。The following example demonstrates adding items to and removing items from controls. 中选择一项时`ListBox1`控制，一个新可以创建具有相同值的控件，并将其添加到`ListBox2`控制，如果`ListBox2`控件不包含具有该文本的项。When an item is selected in the `ListBox1` control, a new control with the same value can be created and added to the `ListBox2` control, if the `ListBox2` control does not already contain an item with that text. 在此示例中调用的构造函数与`enabled`设置为`true`。In this example the constructor is called with `enabled` set to `true`. 如果调用它时`enabled`设置为`false`，新控件不显示在控件。If it was called with `enabled` set to `false`, the new control would not appear in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListItem.ListItem4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItem.ListItem4 Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListItem.ListItem4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItem.ListItem4 Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

public: property System::Web::UI::AttributeCollection ^ Attributes { System::Web::UI::AttributeCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取类不直接支持的 的特性名和值对的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of attribute name and value pairs for the that are not directly supported by the class.

value.span: 包含名称和值对的集合的 。

span.span: A that contains a collection of name and value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要管理的属性名称和值对集合中的开始和结束标记的声明，但不是直接支持的类。Use the collection to manage the attribute name and value pairs declared in the opening and closing tags of the , but not directly supported by the class. 以编程方式，您可以添加或删除集合的属性。You can programmatically add or remove attributes to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否启用了列表项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the list item is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了列表项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list item is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指定是否控制是启用还是禁用状态。The property allows you to specify whether a control is enabled or disabled. 一个已禁用的控件将呈灰色，以指示不能选择它。A control that is disabled is dimmed to indicate that it cannot be selected. 使用此属性来禁用控件中任意一种控制或控件。Use this property to disable a control in either a control or a control. > [!NOTE] > 不能使用此属性来禁用控制控制或控件。You cannot use this property to disable a control in a control or control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性可用于以编程方式禁用中的列表项控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically disable list items in a control. 第一个问题会要求用户选择对应于用户的职业的单选按钮。The first question asks the user to select the radio button that corresponds to the user's occupation. 如果用户指示他或她不是一名开发人员，第二个单选按钮列表中的列表项被禁用。If the user indicates that he or she is not a developer, the list items in the second radio button list are disabled. 第二个问题会要求用户选择主要的编程语言。The second question asks the user to select a primary programming language. 此问题不是开发人员的用户无关。This question is not relevant to a user that is not a developer. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListItem.Enabled#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItem.Enabled/CS/listitem.enabledcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListItem.Enabled#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItem.Enabled/VB/listitem.enabledvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否包含该列表控件中当前选定。Use the property to determine whether the is currently selected in the list control that contains it. 通常使用此属性，当循环访问一系列中列表控件，以确定是否选择了某项的对象。This property is commonly used, when iterating through a collection of objects in a list control, to determine whether an item is selected. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性时循环访问的集合控件来确定状态的复选框。The following example demonstrates how to use the property when iterating through the collection of a control to determine which check boxes are selected. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置列表控件中为 所表示的项显示的文本。

value.span: 列表控件中为 控件所表示的项显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in a list control for the item represented by the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定所表示的项的列表控件中显示的文本。Use the property to specify or determine the text displayed in a list control for the item represented by the . > [!NOTE] > 如果属性包含`null`，则`get`访问器返回的值属性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果属性，又包含`null`，返回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
